subject: #2 #3 #4: orchestrator分割 + registration関数分割 + STEP実行ラッパー共通化
description: #2: orchestrator.py execute_step_generic()をguard_prereqs/guard_mutex/run_with_retry等に分割。#3: registration.py register_manuscript_endpointをbuild_midid_map/resolve_komi_type_map等に分割。#4: registration.pyのSTEP実行エンドポイントのtry/except/tracker共通化。
